main.name: Carlos Salamanca
main.description: I'm a guy from Colombia always exploring new technologies and challenges.
main.bio: I think that we always have to innovate in technology issues and keep abreast of new developments that come to the public every day. That is why in the projects in which I participate I like to be in constant learning and give my best to my clients.
